last_episode_to_air.name: The Murder at the Vicarage
last_episode_to_air.overview: Faced with two false confessions and numerous suspects after a despised civil magistrate is found shot in the local vicarage, Detective Inspector Slack reluctantly accepts help from Miss Marple.

name: Miss Marple: The Murder at the Vicarage

overview: Faced with two false confessions and numerous suspects after a despised civil magistrate is found shot in the local vicarage, Detective Inspector Slack reluctantly accepts help from Miss Marple.
